title: VTOL: check mission feasibility as rotary wing

conversation.author: sanderux
conversation.body: VTOL mission feasibility can be validated on rotary wing basis so no fixed wing landing feasibility will fail the mission

issue_comments.author: RomanBapst
issue_comments.body: @sanderux Did you test this! If yes I will rebase and merge, looks good.

issue_comments.author: sanderux
issue_comments.body: Yes, tested and works. I should note that it does now allow a mission where fw flight flies at very low altitudes when vtol

issue_comments.author: AndreasAntener
issue_comments.body: @tumbili Roman I think we can pull this in. Need to think about further mission check strategies for vtol
